segments.text: I notice the boy is really stretching to reach that cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s standing on a wobbly stool, and it looks like it’s about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently, her hand outstretched, hoping for a treat.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re trying to be sneaky, but they’re not very good at it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is right there, but she’s completely unaware of what they’re doing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see the water from the sink spreading across the floor, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really determined to get those cookies, even if it means falling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will catch him if he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen, and no one is doing anything about it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be very surprised when she finally notices the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so focused on the cookies that he doesn’t realize how dangerous his position is.
segments.speaker: PAR
